mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar_setting (calendar_setting_no, user_no, main_calendar_type, calendar_start_day, show_movie, show_sport_oversea_soccer, show_sport_soccer, show_sport_oversea_baseball, show_sport_baseball, show_sport_oversea_basketball, show_sport_basketball) VALUES( calendar_setting_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{mainCalendarType}, #{calendarStartDay}, #{showMovie}, #{showSportOverseaSoccer}, #{showSportSoccer}, #{showSportOverseaBaseball}, #{showSportBaseball}, #{showSportOverseaBasketball}, #{showSportBasketball} )
mapper.select: SELECT calendar_setting_no, user_no, main_calendar_type, calendar_start_day, show_movie, show_sport_oversea_soccer, show_sport_soccer, show_sport_oversea_baseball, show_sport_baseball, show_sport_oversea_basketball, show_sport_basketball FROM calendar_setting WHERE user_no = #{value}
